project_plan.name: Basic Data Analysis on CSV File
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program that performs basic data analysis on a CSV file, calculating and displaying the mean, median, and mode for user-specified numerical columns.

task.name: Implement functionality to load a CSV file
Implement functionality to display available numerical columns for analysis
Implement functionality to calculate the mean of specified columns
Implement functionality to calculate the median of specified columns
Implement functionality to calculate the mode of specified columns
Write tests for each of the functionalities above
Execute tests on all implemented functionalities to ensure that they function correctly
